summary: Pour la version française de cette page, voir GAO-23-106085 . Various sources report that mining and trade of "conflict minerals," such as tin and gold, are helping fund conflict in the Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC). According to our interviews with 10 DRC experts and our review of UN and other documents and data: Armed groups, which may profit from conflict minerals, have contributed...
title: Conflict Minerals: Overall Peace and Security in Eastern Democratic Republic of the Congo Has Not Improved Since 2014
